owun kawrudana yath, sadharana andamin palanaya kala palakaya; dewiyan wenuwen thama tharunya kapakala thanaththa; sama mohothema thama hadawatha masjidaya samaga bandi athi thanaththa; allah wenuwenma pamanak alum karana dedena, owun ekathu wanneda wen wanneda allah wenuwenma panani; alankara, kulawath kanthawak (aniyam sambhandayak sandaha) aradhana kalath ‘ma allahta biya wemiyi’ pawasa in walaki sitina thanaththa; thama wam athata horen dakunu athin dana dena thanaththa; hudakalawe sita allahwa menehi kota kandulu salana thanaththa we (sahih al buhari, weluma 1 hadis ankaya 629 saha sahih muslim welama 2, hadis ankaya 2248).

namuth thrasthawadaya walakwime panatha wenuwata agramathyawarayasampadanaya kara thibena nawa nithiyata anuwa yam thrasthawadi saka karuwekuta erehiwa pramanawath sakshi nathinam samawa illima, pasuthawima prakasha kirima, punaruththapanaya labima, idiriyedi aparadha nokirimata porondu wima, prajasewaye niyuthu wima, wani kondesiyak matha nithipathiwarayata ho maha adhikaranayata ema thrasthawadiyata erehiwa gena thibena nithimaya kriyamarga athhituwiya haka.

hiru ef.em. samanga bandunu suwahasak shrawakayan wenuwen pin sith peradariwa sanwidhana kerena hiru siddhartha gauthama dambaadiwa wandanawa aarambha kerune eeye (31) dinayedi wana athara, dina 12ka kalayak mema pinbara wandana charikawa kriyathmakayi.sama sathiye dinakama hiru ef.em. osse pracharaya wana siddhartha gauthama rediyo natya asuren asana lada prashnayata niwaradi pilithura labadun thawath wasanawantha pirisakuyi mema dambaadiwa wandana charikawa sandaha ekwanne.siyalu pahasukam sahithawa sanwidhana wana hiru siddhartha gauthama dambaadiwa wandanawedi sambudu pahasa lath wehera wihara rasak wandanamana kirimata eeta ekwana bathimathunta awasthawa salasima wisheshathwayak.ee anuwa buddhagayawa, shri maha bodhiya, rajagahanuwara, wishala mahanuwara, kusinarawa, lumbiniya, sawathnuwara athulu siddhasthana rasak wandanamana kirimata owunta hakiyawa labenawa.
